summary.para: The DRAWTEXTPARAMS structure contains extended formatting options for the function.
The size of each tab stop, in units equal to the average character width.
The left margin, in units equal to the average character width.
The right margin, in units equal to the average character width.

Receives the number of characters processed by , including white-space characters. The number can be the length of the string or the index of the first line that falls below the drawing area. Note that DrawTextEx always processes the entire string if the DT_NOCLIP formatting flag is specified.
